Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Liver Diseases/Hepatitis/Hepatitis, Viral, Human
Record.Description: INFLAMMATION of the LIVER in humans due to infection by VIRUSES. There are several significant types of human viral hepatitis with infection caused by enteric-transmission (HEPATITIS A; HEPATITIS E) or blood transfusion (HEPATITIS B; HEPATITIS C; and HEPATITIS D).
